name: The Lost Kingdom Prophecy
summary: Restore the alliance between mortals and Elementals in The Lost Kingdom Prophecy, a mystical quest to save a fallen realm. It is said that as long as the Tree of Life is in bloom, peace will reign over the Kingdom of Rosefal, but this year, its flowers have stopped drifting in the wind. A banished wizard spreads corruption and fear, and only you can help.
